      • getConfiguredSettingsRepository

        public static Settings4jRepository getConfiguredSettingsRepository(String classpathUrl)
        Read and parse a Settings4j.xml Configuration from Classpath and return the SettingsRepository.
        Parameters:
        classpathUrl - The Classpath url where the settings4j.xml are placed.
        Returns:
        The SettingsRepository based on the given configuration found in the classpathUrl

      • getTmpFolder

        public static File getTmpFolder()
        The TempFolder from System Property "java.io.tmpdir" and the subfolder "Settings4jUnittest".

        On my windows maschine this is:
        C:\Dokumente und Einstellungen\hbrabenetz\Lokale Einstellungen\Temp\Settings4jUnittest\
        Returns:
        to tempfolder for unittests

      • getTestFolder

        public static File getTestFolder()
        The test Folder for Unittest.
        This is normaly a subfolder "target/test/Settings4jUnittest" of this current Project.
        Returns:
        the subfolder "target/test/Settings4jUnittest" of the current Project.
